channel.title: CVE Feed for FANUC -- R-30iA, R-30iA Mate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FANUC -- R-30iA, R-30iA Mate

item.title: CVE-2021-32996|2024-09-16T18:24:56.616Z -- fanuc -- r-30ia%2C%20r-30ia%20mate
item.description: The FANUC R-30iA and R-30iB series controllers are vulnerable to integer coercion errors, which cause the device to crash. A restart is required.
